entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is talking to someone about his experience with the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are a group of people who are waiting for Harry and his friends. They surround them as soon as they take off.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the main antagonist of the story. He catches up with Harry and his friends.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is a character who is concerned about Harry's safety. She hugs him and asks if she has any brandy.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a character who is shaken by the events that have occurred. He asks Molly if she has any brandy for medicinal purposes.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a character who provides information to Harry about what happened to Ron and Tonks.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends. He missed his Portkey with Tonks.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is one of Harry's friends. She missed her Portkey with Ron.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: The Portkey is an object that allows people to travel quickly from one place to another.

relationships.description: Harry and his friends were surrounded by the Death Eaters as soon as they took off.
Voldemort caught up with Harry and his friends.
Molly asked Hagrid if she had any brandy for medicinal purposes.
Ginny told Harry that Ron missed his Portkey with Tonks.
Tonks missed her Portkey with Ron.
